text: John Laughlin (born April 3, 1956), sometimes credited as John C. McLaughlin or John McLaughlin, is an American film and television actor. ==Career== Since 1978, he has appeared in over 25 films and at least 30 television productions. ===Partial filmography=== * as Troy in An Officer and a Gentleman (1982) * as Bobby Grady in Crimes of Passion (1984) * as Woody in Footloose (1984) * as Hulk in The Hills Have Eyes Part II (1984) * as Jeff Schubb in Midnight Crossing (1988) * as Man at Wagon Wheel in Motorama (1991) * as Zix in Under Siege (1992) * as Jake in The Lawnmower Man (1992) * as USAF CAS general Peterson in The Rock (1996) * as base commander in Fortress (2012) * as Howard in The Good, the Bad and the Dead (2015) Captain Alan Redding « « Fake It Until You Make It », episode 6, season 15, NCIS ===Partial television work=== * as Paddy Falahey in The White Shadow (1980–81) * as Biff Gregory in The Dukes of Hazzard (1982) * as Wally Markham in Murder with Mirrors (1985) * as Samuel Doros in Love's Abiding Joy (2006) * as Mike Lowery in Murder, She Wrote (1988) ==References== ==External links== * * "Love Comes Softly Film #3: Love's Abiding Joy with Erin Cottrell, Logan Bartholomew, James Tupper" article Category:1956 births Category:American male film actors Category:American male television actors Category:Living people
